SELECT r.rno as "raffle.rno", r.rtitle as "raffle.rtitle", r.rsubtitle as "raffle.rsubtitle", r.rcategory as "raffle.rcategory", r.rstartedat as "raffle.rstartedat", r.rfinishedat as "raffle.rfinishedat", ri.rthumbnailimg as "raffleImage.rthumbnailimg", ri.rthumbnailimgtype as "raffleImage.rthumbnailimgtype", ri.rthumbnailimgoname as "raffleImage.rthumbnailimgoname", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raffleDetail rd WHERE rd.rno = r.rno) AS "raffle.rwinnercount"
FROM raffle r INNER JOIN raffleImage ri ON r.rno = ri.rno
WHERE r.rcategory = #{rcategory}
ORDER by "raffle.rwinnercount" DESC
ORDER by r.rstartedat DESC
AND r.rfinishedat < systimestamp
ORDER by r.rfinishedat

SELECT r.rno as "raffle.rno", r.rtitle as "raffle.rtitle", r.rsubtitle as "raffle.rsubtitle", r.rcategory as "raffle.rcategory", r.rstartedat as "raffle.rstartedat", r.rfinishedat as "raffle.rfinishedat", ri.rthumbnailimg as "raffleImage.rthumbnailimg", ri.rthumbnailimgtype as "raffleImage.rthumbnailimgtype", ri.rthumbnailimgoname as "raffleImage.rthumbnailimgoname"
FROM raffle r INNER JOIN raffleImage ri ON r.rno = ri.rno where r.rtitle like '%${word}%'

SELECT rno AS "raffle.rno", rtitle AS "raffle.rtitle", rsubtitle AS "raffle.rsubtitle", rthumbnailimg AS "raffleimage.rthumbnailimg", rcreatedat AS "raffle.rcreatedat" FROM ( SELECT r.rno, rtitle, rsubtitle, rthumbnailimg, rcreatedat, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY rcreatedat DESC) as row_num FROM raffle r INNER JOIN raffleimage ri ON r.rno = ri.rno ) subquery WHERE row_num <= 3

SELECT rno AS "raffle.rno", rtitle AS "raffle.rtitle", rsubtitle AS "raffle.rsubtitle", rthumbnailimg AS "raffleimage.rthumbnailimg", rcreatedat AS "raffle.rcreatedat" FROM ( SELECT r.rno, rtitle, rsubtitle, rthumbnailimg, rcreatedat, rfinishedat, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY rfinishedat DESC) as row_num FROM raffle r INNER JOIN raffleimage ri ON r.rno = ri.rno ) subquery WHERE row_num <= 3
